shorttext: Cove Rise Oil is a sativa-dominant, terpene-rich oil with strong THC potency.
title: Rise Oil (21-27 mg/ml THC,<1 mg/ml CBD)
description: Rise Oil from Cove is made from an ethanol-free CO2 extraction of an indoor-grown sativa-dominant strain formulated with MCT oil. It has strong THC potency, and its rich terpene profile contains myrcene (musky and earthy), beta-caryophyllene (spicy and woodsy), humulene (woodsy) and limonene (lemon and lime). Rise Oil comes in 20 ml bottles. All oil products sold at OCS.ca are for ingestion only. DO NOT smoke or vape these oils. Use as directed.
